title: WEB MATERIAL
description: A modern portfolio website showcasing innovative projects, skills, and achievements.

title: Portfolio
description: My personal website to showcase my projects.

title: GOOGLE KEEP CLONE
description: This project is a clone of the front-end part of a Google keep. This application allows users to create, delete, archive, or simply mark a note as completed when the task is finished and more. Users also are free to choose their preferable theme.

title: LAYOUT APPLE
description: The layout is responsive and minimalistic, aligning with modern UI/UX design principles. Hover effects on cards provide subtle interactivity, enhancing the user experience without being distracting.
